description: The TunePhonik iSx1 portable rechargeable speaker is an ultra-compact, ultra-portable, lightweight, 360-degree speaker. The TunePhonik iSx1 has a simple and clean  design that eliminates the clutter around your electronic devices. Pump out your favorite tunes or movies with crystal clear acoustics from mobile and tablet devices, desktops, or laptop computers anytime
title: Aleratec TunePhonik iSx1 Portable Mini Speakers with Rechargeable Battery for Mp3 Players, iPhone, Android Smartphones, and Tablets
